property.name: Low Luck for Bombing and Territory Damage
Paratroopers Can Move During Non Combat
Paratroopers Can Attack Deep Into Enemy Territory
Kamikaze Suicide Attacks Done By Current Territory Owner
Battleships repair at end of round
Battleships repair at beginning of round
Two HitPoint Units Require Repair Facilities
Unplaced units live when not placed
On Entering Units Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Units Can Be Changed On Capture
Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Force AA Attacks For Last Step Of Fly Over
Defending Suicide and Munition Units Do Not Fire
Shore Bombard Per Ground Unit Restricted
Naval Bombard Casualties Return Fire Restricted
Naval Units May Not NonCombat Move Into Controlled Sea Zones
Produce new fighters on old carriers
Move existing fighters to new carriers
Land existing fighters on new carriers
Raids May Be Preceeded By Air Battles
Damage From Bombing Done To Units Instead Of Territories
Limit SBR Damage To Factory Production
notes
property.value:
WW2 Pacific 1940
TripleA map adaptation created by:
Veqryn - map code, xml file, txt files, flags, art, scrambling, kamikazes, carrier rules, air/naval bases, lots of other engine code
Edwin - politics framework and ui
Squid Daddy - original trigger and support attachment framework
CrystalCT - original map png, some unit art
GudKarma - relief tiles
Bung - making a second set of relief tiles based on ww2v3
And many thanks to Larry Harris for making A&A.
If you wish to contribute or make any comments, visit the forum http://n2.nabble.com/Project-WW2-Pacific-1940-tp4225367p4225367.html


As far as I know, this map is 100% working according to official rules, so please report any bugs at http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=328171


need volunteer for:
Need full description of rules as part of this game description.
Need new artwork for the misc folder, as well as complete txt files for vc.txt, decorations.txt, capitols.txt, pu_place.txt.
May need to edit place.txt to reflect more placements on certain islands.
Redone base tiles using ww2v3's basetiles.

thank you for playing!


recent Change Log:

Version 2.2 changes:
* Fixed Chinese national objective to work properly.

Version 2.1 changes:
* Got everything working according to OOB rules. Only works on TripleA engine 1.5 and greater.
